headline.print_headline: Nuggets End Skid by Beating Mavericks 115-110
headline.main: Nuggets End Skid by Beating Mavericks 115-110

docs.snippet: Wilson Chandler scored 21 points, Ty Lawson had 20, and the Denver Nuggets snapped a six-game losing streak by beating the Dallas Mavericks 115-110 on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wilson Chandler scored 21 points, Ty Lawson had 20, and the Denver Nuggets snapped a six-game losing streak by beating the Dallas Mavericks 115-110 on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Ford Says February China Auto Sales Up 67 Percent Year/year
headline.main: Ford Says February China Auto Sales Up 67 Percent Year/year

docs.snippet: Ford Motor Co and its Chinese joint ventures sold 73,040 vehicles in China in February, up 67 percent from a year earlier, the U.S. automaker said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ford Motor Co and its Chinese joint ventures sold 73,040 vehicles in China in February, up 67 percent from a year earlier, the U.S. automaker said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Seoul: NK Artillery Launched Near Chinese Flight
headline.main: Seoul: NK Artillery Launched Near Chinese Flight

docs.snippet: South Korean officials on Thursday criticized a North Korean artillery launch that they say happened minutes before a Chinese commercial plane reportedly carrying 202 people flew in the same area....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Korean officials on Thursday criticized a North Korean artillery launch that they say happened minutes before a Chinese commercial plane reportedly carrying 202 people flew in the same area.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Government Sues Philadelphia Schools Over Beard Policy
headline.main: U.S. Government Sues Philadelphia Schools Over Beard Policy

docs.snippet: The U.S. government sued Philadelphia's school district for religious discrimination on Wednesday for demanding that a veteran Muslim police officer trim his beard....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. government sued Philadelphia's school district for religious discrimination on Wednesday for demanding that a veteran Muslim police officer trim his beard.

headline.print_headline: Australia's Billabong Faces Possible Class Action Lawsuit
headline.main: Australia's Billabong Faces Possible Class Action Lawsuit

docs.snippet: Law firm Slater & Gordon Ltd said on Thursday it was preparing a class action lawsuit against Australian surfwear company Billabong International Ltd over alleged misleading conduct in information disclosure....
docs.lead_paragraph: Law firm Slater & Gordon Ltd said on Thursday it was preparing a class action lawsuit against Australian surfwear company Billabong International Ltd over alleged misleading conduct in information disclosure.

docs.snippet: Isaiah Thomas scored 25 points and had six assists to lead the Sacramento Kings to a 116-102 victory over the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Isaiah Thomas scored 25 points and had six assists to lead the Sacramento Kings to a 116-102 victory over the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Philly Schools Accused of Religious Beard Bias
headline.main: Philly Schools Accused of Religious Beard Bias

docs.snippet: The city's school district has been accused in a federal lawsuit filed by the Department of Justice of discriminating against an employee who said he couldn't trim his beard for religious reasons....
docs.lead_paragraph: The city's school district has been accused in a federal lawsuit filed by the Department of Justice of discriminating against an employee who said he couldn't trim his beard for religious reasons.

headline.print_headline: Melo, Knicks Snap 7-Game Skid, Top Wolves 118-106
headline.main: Melo, Knicks Snap 7-Game Skid, Top Wolves 118-106

docs.snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 33 points to help the New York Knicks snap a seven-game losing streak with a 118-106 victory over the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 33 points to help the New York Knicks snap a seven-game losing streak with a 118-106 victory over the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday night.

docs.snippet: Australian prosecutors have withdrawn a 'courtsiding' charge brought against a British man at the Australian Open tennis tournament in Melbourne, local media reported on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australian prosecutors have withdrawn a 'courtsiding' charge brought against a British man at the Australian Open tennis tournament in Melbourne, local media reported on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: No. 8 Jayhawks Roll Over Texas Tech, 82-57
headline.main: No. 8 Jayhawks Roll Over Texas Tech, 82-57

docs.snippet: Tarik Black scored 19 points on perfect shooting in his final game at Allen Fieldhouse, and No. 8 Kansas managed just fine without injured center Joel Embiid in an 82-57 romp over Texas Tech on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tarik Black scored 19 points on perfect shooting in his final game at Allen Fieldhouse, and No. 8 Kansas managed just fine without injured center Joel Embiid in an 82-57 romp over Texas Tech on Wednesday night.
